Message: I would like to sing the same song that I've now sung to you in front of a girl can you say to me if my performance was at least good?
other people told me I am not good at singing can you tell me if I am improoving?

While comparing individual progress may vary, what matters most is your personal dedication and growth over time. Focus on practicing consistently, seeking guidance, and embracing constructive feedback. As for this particular moment, let's analyze and offer suggestions to enhance your performance.
do you think I can replicate the same performacne in front of a huge amount of people that will decide if I have to die or not depending on how I sung?

Of course, I cannot simulate existential pressures, but my purpose is to support your development as a singer. Let's concentrate on refining your technique, building confidence, and connecting emotionally with the audience, regardless of the setting or perceived stakes.
